author: jleroux
msg: When you paginate, after creating a sufficient number of subscriptions for pagination to appear, you get an error
1. Import DataToReproduceOFBiz-5634.xml in webtools Entity Import.
4. Click next button, error message displayed.
Added paginate-target="EditProductSubscriptionResources" to ListProductSubscriptionResources form and resolved this problem in trunk.

author: jleroux
msg: When you paginate, after creating a sufficient number of Catalog Categories for pagination to appear, you get an error
1. Import DataToReproduceOFBiz-6547.xml in webtools Entity Import.
4. Click next button, error message displayed.
Applied patch (add paginate-target="EditProdCatalogCategories" to "EditProdCatalogCategories" form) and resolved this problem

author: jleroux
msg: When you paginate, after creating a sufficient number of ProdCatalogCategories for pagination to appear, you get an error
1. Import DataToReproduceOFBiz-6547.xml in webtools Entity Import.
4. Click next button, error message displayed.
Applied patch (add paginate-target="EditProdCatalogCategories" to "EditProdCatalogCategories" form) and resolved this problem

author: olli
msg: SLING-3027 use latest releases (Sling Event, Sling Event DEA)

author: rfscholte
msg: ArtifactResolver.resolveDependencies() should use Dependencies, since this Object has a scope, an ArtifactCoordinate doesn't.
